message:
THERE was a fantastic response to our exclusive
interview with the world's leading sexologist, Dr Sherif
Wakil, in the last issue
Readers inundated us with questions about their own
sexual health problems and now the Harley Street expert
has been signed up by MilliOnAir magazine.
Dr Wakil – known globally as Dr Orgasm, often
shortened to Dr O – has an unrivalled reputation in the
field of sexual aesthetics and has successfully treated
more than 15,000 women and men from around the globe.

And now he is ready to answer your most personal
questions.
Whether you suffer from loss of sexual appetite, failure to
have an orgasm, pain during sex, premature ejaculation,
erectile dysfunction or any other intimate difficulties, Dr
O can help improve your sex life.
